q: , who plays scathing cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the TV show, believes there are many similarities between the teacher and the straight-talking talent show judge. Jane Lynch Inspired By Simon Cowell For Glee Character. She said: If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her. He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her. Jane Lynch also admitted she is`` amazed'' by the public's reaction to Sue and believes people admire her in the same way they respect music mogul Simon Cowell . Our Silver Perspectives enrichment program offers travelers interesting journeys hosted by noted historians, political analysts, bestselling authors and other esteemed experts,'' said Steve Tucker, Silversea's vice president of field sales for North America. And many of these voyages will feature several guest lecturers teaming up to host a broad range of entertaining and enlightening presentations on a single itinerary.
